main.name: John Tawfik
main.description: studying Computer Science and pursuing a minor in Politics, Philosophy, and Economics!
main.bio: I'm a current Rutgers University Student, Freelancer, and Egyptian-American! In my free time I love to hangout with friends, go to the gym, or read. My current read is Atomic Habits by James Clear, check it out!

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Working on the Event Infrastructure team using React, Solidity, TypeScript, and Firestore to create and optimize the campaign creation pipeline for brands.

work.title: Freelancer
work.description: Completed multiple projects using technologies such as React Native, Solidity, Web3.js, Draft.js, and more.

work.title: Product Management Intern
work.description: Partnered with CTO, designers, engineers, and business stakeholders in a company of 35 employees to define the  product roadmap and features.

work.company: Campaign for Angela Fam and Adam Mott
work.title: Political Intern
work.description: Assisted in furthering the campaign of Angela Fam and Adam Mott.

education.description: I've learned a lot about myself by virtue of the challenges college provides. Besides the technologies I already know, I've been able to expand my understanding of C, Java, and JavaScript. Beyond Computer Science, I've been able to learn more about numerous facets of the world, and meet amazing people from every walk of life.

testimonials.text: John understood my thoughts on how to be an effective business leader, and I know that he will impart these concepts upon others as he continues down his path of life. I have no doubts that he possess the will and desire to be an effective and contributing member to the technology world.
